explains: n. 减速；怠工；降低速度

sentences.en: There has been a sharp slowdown in economic growth.
sentences.cn: 在经济增长方面一直存在急剧的减速。

sentences.en: Customers have cut back spending because of the economic slowdown.
sentences.cn: 由于经济放缓，顾客们已经减少了花销。

sentences.en: Ms. Su says the slowdown in growth is not due to shoppers losing their enthusiasm, but because of the abundance of competitors around town.
sentences.cn: 苏女士说，增长率的逐渐下滑不是因为店主们失去了热情，而是因为在这个城镇周围有太多的竞争者了。
